description:
Misaki`s brother and guardian, Takahiro, had moved to Osaka. Thus Misaki was living with Akihiko. But now Takahiro is coming back, and he wants Misaki to live with him again. Misaki can`t say no to his brother, so does that mean saying goodbye to Akahiko?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Travelers Have No Need for Shame
